cause.description:
Sign a petition that says that you would like congress to move in the direction of renewable energy sources. We have the technology necessary to support such a change and by setting specific goals we have a means to get there!
Join Environment Georgia's campaign to invest in a new energy future!
Sign the petition at:
https://www.environmentgeorgia.org/action/clean-energy/energy-future
1. Our dependence on oil must be reduced.
2. We have the technology to produce renewable energy through such sources as wind, solar, and farm-based bio fuels.
3. With high performance homes, buildings, and appliances, we could reduce our energy use by 10% by 2025.
4. It is up to our generation to act now and invest in a new energy future!
5. We can voice our concern by signing the petition at: https://www.environmentgeorgia.org/action/clean-energy/energy-future
cause.mission: Take the time to call on congress to take the steps necessary to begin investing in a new energy future.
cause.name: Our Renewable Energy Future
